Assembled!

18 Jul 2007 [G2:11476]

I assembled the frame for the vacuform machine today. After half an hour measuring, and another half hour drilling, I was ready to assemble everything. As I expected, I was unable to drill the holes straight down, most of them are 5-10 degrees off :(
I need to get a column-drill thingy...

Also expected: the side-pieces (on which the 102cm squared panels rest) don't fit together nicely in the corners. That's why I bought the planer, and I still need to use it on those side-pieces.
